text: Melina Kanakaredes (born April 23, 1967) is an American video game, television and soap opera actress. She played Dr. Sydney Hansen in the television series Providence on NBC. She later played Stella Bonasera on CSI: NY on CBS (2004 to 2010). Kanakaredes was born in Akron, Ohio. ==Awards and nominations== Year Association Category Work Result 1994 Daytime Emmys Outstanding Younger Actress in a Drama Series Guiding Light 1995 Daytime Emmys Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Drama Series Guiding Light 2000 TV Guide Awards Favorite Actress in a Drama Providence ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1967 births Category:American television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Akron, Ohio Category:Living people
title: Melina Kanakaredes
